attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again the Labour Govenment are creating jobs for the boys,and who will suffer? everyone trying to sell there homes. What right have they to charge us to sell our own homes without consulting us first. Once again they are trying to sqeeze more money off us, they should be ashamed of themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
